articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: Experts explain jurors' mixed verdict in E. Jean Carroll v. Trump case
articles.description: Jurors in the E. Jean Carroll case against Donald Trump found him liable of sexual abuse -- and not rape -- likely because they expected hard evidence, experts say.
articles.content: Jurors in the E. Jean Carroll lawsuit against Donald Trump found him liable of sexual abuse — and not rape — likely because they expected “Law & Order”-style forensic evidence to prove the more serious claim, legal experts told The Post on Wednesday.... [3306 chars]
